name: Hungry Hungry Hydras
description: Hello World, we are the Hydraters (although we are very dehydrated).  This is a game about cooking together, while tied  together. Hungry Hungry Hydras is a 3 player game where you each control the head of a hydra - think 2D overcooked, but you have no arms. Work together to make burgers at your famous Burgerria in the heart of Copenhagen. Go forth Hydra, show us that mythical beasts deserve a table among the finest chefs in the world.
